com.epam.training.util

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.training.util.Validator

  • public abstract class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Validator contains various methods that allow to validate data received from JSPs before inserting them into the database/updating the database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vasili Andreev
